txt.en: 'For better or worse, I have made a decision, but my path does not seem any less complicated.\n\n'I hope I do not steer my people wrong!'

'I have even more doubts than when we began our conversation, [placeholder].'

You encourage Agelwyn to choose what she wants to do, whether it is listening to her husband or listening to her people, and stand by her decision.

'I will try it, [placeholder].... I hope it makes things easier.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must choose only one of the three styles of leadership.</rgb>
Help Agelwyn lead her people by choosing one style of command

Agelwyn can be found in the refugees' hiding spot in Marton in the northern Westfold.

You should help Agelwyn choose one style of command for her first decision as acting Thane: 

1. Should she make a decision herself and deliver the command to her people?
2. Should she ask her people to vote on what they think is best, and let the majority decide?
3. Should she listen to the people's opinions, and then make an informed decision?

You must choose one.
Agelwyn needs a little assistance with her first big decision as a leader of Marton's people.
Agelwyn can be found in the refugees' hiding spot in Marton in the northern Westfold.\n\nYou should speak with Agelwyn.
The First Decisions of a New Thane
